name: horizontal-video-testimonials
description: A section with a listing of horizontal video cards, with a section title and link to watch more.

sectionConfiguration.title: Section Configuration
sectionConfiguration.description: The heading for the section, appearing above the grid of cards. If the title is empty, the heading and call to action link will be hidden.

ctaUrl.title: Matrix Asset Link
ctaUrl.description: Select an asset to link to. If this field is filled out, it will be used instead of the manual link

ctaManualUrl.title: External/Manual Link
ctaManualUrl.description: Enter the full URL, including https://

bgImage.title: Background Image
bgImage.description: Select a background image for the section. A dark overlay will be applied over the image.

marginTop.title: Spacing above (top margin)
marginTop.description: Add spacing above the component. 'Base' is the smallest with '10' (default) being the largest option. Selecting 'default' will use the default site-wide vertical spacing between components.

marginBottom.title: Spacing below (bottom margin)
marginBottom.description: Add spacing below the component. 'Base' is the smallest with '10' (default) being the largest option. Selecting 'default' will use the default site-wide vertical spacing between components.

testimonials.title: Video Testimonials
testimonials.description: Enter the details for each video testimonial card.

videoImage.title: Video preview image
videoImage.description: Select an image to use as the video preview.

youtubeId.title: Youtube video ID
youtubeId.description: Enter the video ID from YouTube.

internalUrl.title: Story link (Matrix asset link)
internalUrl.description: Select a page/asset to link to. If this field is filled out, it will be used instead of the manual link field below.

externalUrl.title: Manual story link
externalUrl.description: Enter the full URL, including https://.
